title: Joe Morton, From Stage To Screen And Back Again
description: It's Tuesday: Joe Morton is now starring in the title role of the Shakespeare Center of Los Angeles production of Henry IV, and is known for his Emmy-award winning role as Eli Pope in Scandal. He talks to Sam about dropping out of college after being told his race would "color" a production, and making it in theater, film, and television. Tickets and information on Henry IV at shakespearecenter.org.

itunes:title: Joe Morton, From Stage To Screen And Back Again
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Morton stars alongside Tom Hanks in a new stage production of Henry IV. He's also known for his role as Eli Pope on Scandal.
